title: Memphis Natural Health
description: Holistic medicine for the Memphis area. Dr April Sullivan, ND is a naturopathic doctor offering natural health options in the Memphis, TN area. Dr. Sullivan is the only naturopathic doctor in the Memphis area that has attended a 4 year accredited naturopathic medical program. Dr. Sullivan is knowled
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Update: Memphis Natural Health is still offering in-person appointments. However, we ask that anyone that has been exposed to the coronavirus or has cold or flu-like symptoms to please stay home. Phone and video appointments are available for all appointment types. You can select which visit type you would like when scheduling online. If a video visit is requested, you will then be contacted with further information on how to proceed with the video visit.
